description: A photo of Bobby Western posing with salvage diving gear, from '81.

core:description.text: The photo depicts a group of men standing on the bank of a river. The men are wearing salvage-diving gear. One of them is Bobby Western, looking like he's in his mid-thirties. Although this is a work photo, he looks haunted, as if he was doing his best to look normal even though a current of despair bubbled inside him. Someone wrote '81 in a corner.
